A

addPerson(int) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to add a new person with the corresponding face data to the recognition album.

C

clone() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
 
com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face - package com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
 

D

deletePerson(int) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to delete a specific person and all its corresponding face data from the recognition album.
deserializeRecognitionAlbum(byte[]) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to load a serialized recognition album created by the FacialProcessing.serializeRecogntionAlbum() API, into the facial recognition framework.

F

FaceData - Class in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
Face objects are used to store the facial data elements returned by the facial processing engine.
FacialProcessing - Class in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
The FacialProcessing class is used to execute the facial feature scanning on an image as well as performing facial recognition queries.
FacialProcessing.FEATURE_LIST - Enum in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
 
FacialProcessing.FP_DATA - Enum in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
 
FacialProcessing.FP_MODES - Enum in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
 
FacialProcessing.PREVIEW_ROTATION_ANGLE - Enum in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
This enum is used to denote the rotation angle that is required to align the preview data with the preview on screen.
FacialProcessingConstants - Class in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face
 
FacialProcessingConstants() - Constructor for class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
 
FP_CONFIDENCE_OUT_OF_RANGE_ERROR - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
Expect this result when the operation of setting the face recognition confidence level fails because the input value is not between 0 and 100
FP_FACE_EXIST_ERROR - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
Expect this result when the operation of adding a new person fails because a similar face already exists in the album
FP_INTERNAL_ERROR - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
This result is returned when the facial processing engine has suffered a catastrophic failure
FP_NO_FACE_DETECTED_ERROR - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
Expect this result when the operation of adding a new person to the the album or updating a new face to an existing person fails because no face is detected in the image/frame
FP_NOT_PROCESSED - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
Expect this result when the Enum value for the face data is not specified
FP_PERSON_NOT_REGISTERED - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
Expect this result when operation of getting person id or face recognition confidence fails because the person is not yet added to the recognition album
FP_SUCCESS - Static variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessingConstants
Expect this result when the operation of updating a face to an existing person in the album or setting setting the face recognition confidence are successful

G

getAlbumPersonCount() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to query the recognition album for the total number of people stored in the recognition album
getEyeGazePoint() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
Returns the gaze point the eyes are looking toward in relation to the position of the camera.
getEyeHorizontalGazeAngle() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
Returns the horizontal gaze angle value.
getEyeVerticalGazeAngle() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
Returns the vertical gaze angle value.
getFaceData() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Use to request an array of Face objects, one for each face detected in the input image.
getFaceData(EnumSet<FacialProcessing.FP_DATA>) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Use to request an array of Face object, one for each face detected in the input image.
getInstance() - Static method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Creates a new facial processing object and loads the necessary libraries needed to scan and process images for facial data.
getLeftEyeBlink() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
Returns the left eye blink value for the detected face.
getNumFaces() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Use to query the framework for the number of faces detected in the image last input through setFrame() or setBitmap().
getPersonId() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
This API returns the personID for the face in the recognition album that matches the input face from the processed frame or bitmap.
getPitch() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
This API returns the value of how much a detected face is looking up/down
getRecognitionConfidence() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
This API returns a value representing how confident the face engine software is, that the input face matches the face data of a person in the recognition album.
getRightEyeBlink() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
Returns the right eye blink value for the detected face.
getRoll() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
This API returns the value of how much a detected face has been tilted.
getSmileValue() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
Returns the smile value for the detected face.
getYaw() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
This API returns the value of how much a detected face is looking left/right.

I

isFeatureSupported(FacialProcessing.FEATURE_LIST) - Static method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Use this method to determine if an facial processing feature is supported by the device at runtime.

L

leftEye - Variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
The X,Y coordinates of the center of the left eye in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

M

mouth - Variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
The X,Y coordinates of the center of the mouth in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

N

normalizeCoordinates(int, int) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Normalizes/scales the co-ordinates to the desired dimension.

R

rect - Variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
The X,Y coordinates of the rectangle bounding the detected face in relation to the resolution of the raw image data
release() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
This method will release the facial processor
resetAlbum() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to remove all data from the recognition album.
rightEye - Variable in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FaceData
The X,Y coordinates of the center of the right eye in relation to the resolution of the raw image data

S

serializeRecogntionAlbum() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to convert the recognition album into a byte array so that the application can store the data on a persistent storage memory for later use.
setBitmap(Bitmap) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Sets the static image to be scanned and processed.
setFrame(byte[], int, int, boolean, FacialProcessing.PREVIEW_ROTATION_ANGLE) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Sets the image to be scanned and processed.
setProcessingMode(FacialProcessing.FP_MODES) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Use to configure the scanning mode for the facial processing engine.
setRecognitionConfidence(int) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: This API sets the threshold value at which the face engine will ignore any face data matches with a confidence value below the set threshold.

U

updatePerson(int, int) - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.face.FacialProcessing
Description: Use this API to add additional faces (face data) to an existing person in the recognition album.
